item.title: WSL2 + podman
item.description: UPDATE: podman desktop is now a thing! I had been having some issues with the docker-desktop service on Windows, where it wouldn’t autostart properly and would start into a broken state where nothing worked. These problems, together with the license change of the docker-desktop product and recommendations to give podman a try, led me to try podman instead. About podman podman is a container runtime like docker but designed with a different philosophy.
